TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INodeInstance implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents an instance of Node.js to which Remote Procedure Calls (RPC) may be sent.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<T> InvokeExportAsync<T> (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken, string moduleName, string exportNameOrNull, params object[] args);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<!!T> InvokeExportAsync<T>(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken, string moduleName, string exportNameOrNull, object[] args) cil managed
abstract member InvokeExportAsync : System.Threading.CancellationToken * string * string * obj[] -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<'T>

Docs.typeparam: The JSON-serializable data type that the Node.js code will asynchronously return.
Docs.param: A that can be used to cancel the invocation.
The path to the Node.js module (i.e., JavaScript file) relative to your project root that contains the code to be invoked.
If set, specifies the CommonJS export to be invoked. If not set, the module's default CommonJS export itself must be a function to be invoked.
Any sequence of JSON-serializable arguments to be passed to the Node.js function.
Docs.summary: Asynchronously invokes code in the Node.js instance.
Docs.returns: A representing the completion of the RPC call.
